Package com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d

This package contains support for the Magic Lantern Java2D platform.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MleBufferedImage
    This class provides a BufferedImage that maintains the origin of the image.
    MleJ2dPlatformData
    This class encapsulates data that is specific to the J2D platform.
    MleRenderEngine
    This class implements the base class for a render engine on the Java2D platform.

Package com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d Description

This package contains support for the Magic Lantern Java2D platform.

The package provides a class for buffered images. It also contains a class for rendering 2D Sets.
